page.title: 06A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I am retired.I have lived in Egginton for a few years.The first thing I do is to get up.I get up at about 6.00am. The first thing I do is to have a cup of tea.I take my time over my Breakfast.I normally have porridge and tea or coffee and toast and marmalade and thats lovely.By about 8.00am I've finished my breakfast and my dog Job thinks that its time to go for a walk. We take Job for a walk to the field.After that I find there is lots to do in the garden.Once or twice a week my wife and I go shopping we go to one of the supermarkets in Burton.
